ygData.subject: Re: Eater of the Dead
ygData.msgSnippet: Aries landed on a scorched landscape. There had been a volcanic eruption only days ago. The land was still smoking and the soil would take years to recover...

Aries landed on a scorched landscape. There had been a volcanic 
eruption only days ago. The land was still smoking and the soil would 
take years to recover...

He loved that place!

Aries: Ah! This is the kinda place I could live in! No disturbing 
neighbours, a way to make the yokels believe you're a god and you 
want a virgin to keep you from destroying them, and (picking an olive 
from the upper branches of a partly burnt tree) plenty of oil!

Just then, the third occupant said something.

Dracon: Go that way.

Aries: What? What are you talking about?

There was no answer. None was needed.

Aries: Huh... Okay then...

Aries knew who was the boss. Without knowing it, he was coming closer 
and closer to the Predacon base.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> He was lurking in the night. The Humans wanted their kid back. He 
> would oblige them... to a point.
> 
> Already, the small girl was shaking back into conscience. Quite 
fast, 
> it would seem, as she was now screaming for her parents to save 
her. 
> He and his companions smiled at the thought.
> 
> The large muscular man arrived with two smaller ones. The freed the 
> girl from the plants that tightly held her. None of them saw the... 
> thing leap from the top of the tree. None of them survived to tell 
> the tale.
> 
> He had heard one of his friend say that he was a machine, but he 
did 
> not believe it one bit. He circled the place where the humans died, 
> and swiftly decided that he would eat them. He savagely tore at 
three 
> of them with three different heads at the same time. Blood covered 
> his mouth and that of his friends.
> 
> Aries: Enough now! Leo, you stop being such a loser and accept it! 
> We're not a stupid mindless beast!
> 
> Leo: Aries, shut up! I'm in charge now! You could never prove that 
> before and you're not going to start now!
> 
> Aries: Oh yes I will!
> 
> With a cry of excruciating pain, Leo was relegated to a spectator 
> position. Aries was now in command and he transformed.
> 
> He was not tall, nor was he very impressive. He was just a simple 
> robot. It was more than enoughto prove a point, though.
> 
> Aries:Ha ha! See now? Okay, The food's not good anymore. Let's fly 
> away.
> 
> With that, he stretched his leathery wings and started to cross the 
> Mediterranean sea, heading for Greece.
